attributes.action: not introduce the proposed Pre-U examination and subsequent courses, instead of the current A Level course, which provides a well rounded education to many students and is not in need of replacement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cambridge University is in the development stage of creating a new course and exam called the Pre-U (Pre University)this is a course created primarily to "push students harder", apparently because the current A levels are becoming to devalued. I beg to differ. I believe these our created not for the benefit of the typical sixth form student but for the benefit of applicants for Oxbridge and their admissions departments as A levels are, apparently not good enough! So don't fall into the trap and SIGN!
